title: LaTeX Workflow Optimization
description: Throughout the years, many incredible individuals have made significant efforts to optimize LaTeX workflow. I've spent significant time upgrading preexisting workflows, and would like to share my working setup, in the hopes that others will find it useful, and it may inspire others to continue work on LaTeX optimization.

title: Future LaTeX Workflow Optimization Ideas
description: I have a lot of ideas for new projects to make or things to implement, but often find myself lacking on the requisite time to actually make any of these. However, I feel it is still worthwhile to publicize my ideas, hence this post.

title: Dev Blog
description: A page where I periodically post some short messages about projects I'm working in.
